title: Blended Flipped Learning-Based Program to Enhance Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Support for personal device utilization and hybrid learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of pre-learning materials according to the flipped learning cycle and participate in discussion-based classes.
Learners can submit over 90% of project assignments on time using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can apply metacognitive strategies to reflect on mathematical problem-solving processes in reflective journals with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can perform active collaborative activities with over 75% class participation based on the MUSIC model of motivation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
